statements: SELECT * FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT salary, federal_tax FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE state_tax > 500;
SELECT employee_id, salary, federal_tax, state_tax FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE salary >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE state_tax < federal_tax AND salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE federal_tax = state_tax;
SELECT * FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE state_tax > 100 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE federal_tax < 50;
SELECT employee_id, federal_tax + state_tax AS total_taxes FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Payroll_Taxes WHERE federal_tax BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY state_tax ASC;
SELECT AVG(salary) AS avg_salary, MAX(salary) AS max_salary FROM Payroll_Taxes;
SELECT * FROM payroll_employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM payroll_employee WHERE tax_rate <= 0.2;
SELECT * FROM payroll_employee WHERE tax_rate < 0.15 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT tax_name, tax_rate FROM payroll_tax WHERE tax_category = 'Federal';
SELECT employee_name, salary, tax_rate FROM payroll_employee WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM payroll_employee WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, salary, tax_rate FROM payroll_employee WHERE tax_rate < 0.2;
SELECT tax_name, tax_rate FROM payroll_tax WHERE tax_category = 'Federal';
SELECT employee_name, salary, tax_rate FROM payroll_employee WHERE tax_rate > 0.15 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, tax_category FROM payroll_employee JOIN payroll_tax ON payroll_employee.tax_rate = payroll_tax.tax_rate;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_salary FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, employee_salary FROM employees ORDER BY employee_salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_rates WHERE tax_rate > 10.00;
SELECT payroll_id, gross_salary, net_salary FROM payroll_info WHERE gross_salary >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, employee_salary FROM employees ORDER BY employee_salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, tax_description FROM employees JOIN payroll_info ON employees.employee_id = payroll_info.employee_id JOIN tax_rates ON tax_rates.tax_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(gross_salary) AS avg_salary, MAX(net_salary) AS max_net FROM payroll_info;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(gross_salary) AS total_gross_salary FROM payroll_info GROUP BY employee_id HAVING SUM(gross_salary) > 60000;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM payroll WHERE net_pay > 5000;
SELECT employee_name, tax_amount FROM employees JOIN tax_calculations ON employees.employee_id = tax_calculations.employee_id;
SELECT MIN(salary), MAX(salary), AVG(salary) FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, tax_rate FROM employees WHERE tax_rate < 20.00;
SELECT * FROM payroll ORDER BY pay_period_start DESC;
SELECT employee_name, salary, net_pay FROM employees JOIN payroll ON employees.employee_id = payroll.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, tax_amount FROM employees JOIN tax_calculations ON employees.employee_id = tax_calculations.employee_id WHERE tax_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM Payroll WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT tax_percentage, income_start, income_end FROM TaxRates ORDER BY tax_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaxCalculation WHERE gross_income > 50000 AND tax_amount < 10000;
SELECT log_message FROM EmployeeLogs WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT e.employee_name, p.payment_date FROM Employee e JOIN Payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT t.tax_bracket, t.tax_percentage FROM TaxRates t ORDER BY t.tax_percentage DESC;
SELECT el.log_date, el.log_message FROM EmployeeLogs el WHERE el.employee_id = 123;
